tweet: Last year we introduced #Chronicle, our full permanode framework for decentralized storage on the #IOTA Network. We're happy to share that Chronicle is now in Alpha and ported over to Rust! Check the developments of this new version at  https://t.co/qeIrbbZhHJ

Last year we introduced #Chronicle, our full permanode framework for decentralized storage on the #IOTA Network. We're happy to share that Chronicle is now in Alpha and ported over to Rust! Check the developments of this new version at  https://t.co/bes1dna6WF

This use case is a good example of #IOTA, along w/ R3 Corda (a permissioned #Blockchain), being part of a solution to an end to end process. #IOTA very likely solves existing challenges/problems w/c may be difficult to resolve if only #R3Corda were to be used alone w/out #IOTA.
